DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the analgesic effect of paravertebral block with that of intravenous patient-controlled analgesia after video assisted thoracic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Analgesic Effect of Intravenous Patient-Controlled Analgesia (IV PCA) Versus Paravertebral Block After Video Assisted Thoracic Surgery (VATS)
DOC.criteria: patients receiving video assisted thoracic surgery patients with cardiovascular disease patients with neurologic disease patients with contraindications to paravertebral block or epidural block patients with history of previous VATS patients with pain at the expected incision site
